Review: I've seen all release order UC stuff prior to watching this, and gotta say it just didn't do a lot for me, which I know is sacrilege but just about everything felt unresolved/recycled and I couldn't stand the new characters.

Tons of my friends like this movie and man do I just not see what they saw. Detested nearly every performance, especially Charlie Day who was clearly doing a test run for Benny the Space Guy in The Lego Movie. Idris Elba giving new meaning to phoning in a role. Awful script. I don't even know who the lead actor is. Just made me want to go watch Gundam.
Liked it overall but thought the writing was awful. Tons of amateurish cliches. Good performances though, would have loved a longer cut of it
Classic distillation of Midwestern childhood. Maybe the 2nd best American Christmas movie
Pretty good rehearsal for Trainspotting, which I need to rewatch
Kind of wacky tone-wise but works as sort of a Glaswegian After Hours. Peter Mullan can do no wrong
Chevy Chase needs to be compromised to a permanent end
One of the all time weird movies, worth another watch not fried off my ass
